heroSection.title:
Festival
committee of
heroSection.description: Everything you need to know about festivities in Roquetes is just a click away.

aboutSection.title: Who are we?
aboutSection.description: We are people from Roquetes, neighbors who believe in the value of participation and working together. Behind the committee there are many hours of dedication, meetings, ideas, and above all, a great shared excitement. We collaborate closely with the City Council and other local entities to make each festival special, close to the community, and authentic. If you want to know more, participate, or simply share with us this passion for traditions, you are invited: the committee is also yours.
aboutSection.historyDescription: The Roquetes Festival Committee was born in 1973 with a clear objective: to preserve and promote the popular festivities that give life to our city. Since then, we have been an essential part of the identity of Roquetes, organizing annual celebrations that combine tradition, culture, and participation. Over the years, more than a hundred people have contributed with their effort and passion to consolidate this entity as one of the festive pillars of the municipality. Today, with more than five decades of history, we continue to grow with the same spirit with which we began: making each festival a reflection of the soul of Roquetes.
aboutSection.motivationDescription: We believe that festivals are much more than celebrations: they are moments that strengthen bonds, that connect us with our roots, and that allow us to share the best of ourselves. We are motivated by seeing children, young people, and adults experience with excitement each event, each tradition, and each gathering. We work with enthusiasm to offer inclusive, creative proposals with a sense of community. Our motivation is clear: continue building, through festivals, a lively, united Roquetes that is proud of its culture.
aboutSection.defaultDescription: This staff member has no available description.

wantToParticipateSection.title: Want to participate?
wantToParticipateSection.firstPar: There are many ways to help and participate in setting up festivals and events that take place throughout the year.
wantToParticipateSection.secondPar: You can participate by becoming a member of the association and enjoy all the events of the year, which also includes entry to the town's main festivals every year.
wantToParticipateSection.thirdPar: If you have a group of friends, you can also participate by registering as a crew in the crew competition held every year.
wantToParticipateSection.linksPar: <2>Click here</2> to see the requirements for participating in the crew competition or <1>here</1> to register as a member.

registerPartners.title: Member Registration
registerPartners.descriptionLabel:
Supporting the Patronat is easy â€“ all you have to do is become a member. By joining, you'll not only be contributing to a cause that promotes our traditions and activities, but you'll also enjoy numerous exclusive benefits.

As a member, you'll gain access to special discounts for all events organized by the Patronat. One of the most popular is the ticket for the Festes Majors (Main Festival), which you can get at a reduced price and with the option to pay in three convenient installments throughout the year. This way, you can enjoy more, pay less, and avoid any stress!

If you'd like to join and start enjoying all these benefits, simply fill out the following form. We'll get in touch with you via the email address you provide to complete the registration process.

validation.invalidDni: Please enter a valid ID (8 numbers and a letter).
validation.invalidIban: Please enter a valid IBAN (format ES + 22 digits).
validation.invalidDate: Please enter a valid birth date.
